TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InMemorySymmetricSecurityKey extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey

summary.span: 表示金鑰，這個金鑰是使用對稱演算法所產生，並且只儲存在本機電腦的隨機存取記憶體。

span.span: Represents keys that are generated using symmetric algorithms and are only stored in the local computer's random access memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常這個類別只會被基礎結構用來轉換使用對稱金鑰的 XML。Typically, this class is only used by the infrastructure to transform XML using a symmetric key.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: algorithm
param.span: 表示用來產生衍生金鑰之密碼編譯演算法的 URI。

span.span: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm to use to generate the derived key.

param.name: label
param.span: 陣列，其中包含密碼編譯演算法的標籤參數。

span.span: An array of that contains the nonce that is used to create a derived key.
The size of the derived key.

param.name: offset
param.span: 衍生金鑰在這個方法所傳回之位元組陣列中的所在位置。

span.span: The position at which the derived key is located in the byte array that is returned from this method.

summary.span: 使用目前金鑰指定的密碼編譯演算法和參數來產生衍生金鑰。

span.span: Generates a derived key using the specified cryptographic algorithm and parameters for the current key.

returns.span: 陣列，其中包含衍生金鑰。

span.span: An array of that contains the derived key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了將 P-SHA1 指定成密碼編譯演算法，此時會使用 欄位。To specify P-SHA1 as the cryptographic algorithm, use the field.
